titleStmt.title: Lord have mercy upon vs the vvorld, a sea, a pest-house, the one full of stormes, and dangers, the other full of soares and diseases : the observance from these, (though especially accomodated to the times of this heavy contagion,) fitted for all times : for all men, and all times are sicke, of the cause of this sicknesse : Lord haue mercy vpon vs.
titleStmt.author: T. B. (Thomas Brewer)

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
